entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
